<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Finds the nearest common dominator of a set of BasicBlocks.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For every BB you add to the set, you can specify whether we &quot;remember&quot; the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">/// block.  When you get the common dominator, you can also ask whether it&#39;s one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the blocks we remembered.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator/#ab711ea58bf39e2fd1dd7755b51350844">NearestCommonDominator</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Result = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResultIsRemembered = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add BB to the resulting dominator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> addBlock(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Remember) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Result) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = BB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">      ResultIsRemembered = Remember;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewResult = DT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Result, BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewResult != Result)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      ResultIsRemembered = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewResult == BB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      ResultIsRemembered |= Remember;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result = NewResult;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the nearest common dominator of all the BBs added via addBlock() and</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator/#ace266670c04e6b4a9b909c7f1826d47d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator/#ace266670c04e6b4a9b909c7f1826d47d">result</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// with addAndRememberBlock()?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator/#a13299a8221517e50cc2114bc746e02b4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/nearestcommondominator/#a13299a8221517e50cc2114bc746e02b4">resultIsRememberedBlock</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResultIsRemembered; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Transforms the control flow graph on one single entry/exit region</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">/// at a time.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="comment">/// After the transform all &quot;If&quot;/&quot;Then&quot;/&quot;Else&quot; style control flow looks like</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\verbatim</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">/// | |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">/// | /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |/</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ||   Where:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">/// | |  1 = &quot;If&quot; block, calculates the condition</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 4 |  2 = &quot;Then&quot; subregion, runs if the condition is true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">/// | /  3 = &quot;Flow&quot; blocks, newly inserted flow blocks, rejoins the flow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |/   4 = &quot;Else&quot; optional subregion, runs if the condition is false</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 5    5 = &quot;End&quot; block, also rejoins the control flow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endverbatim</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Control flow is expressed as a branch where the true exit goes into the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &quot;Then&quot;/&quot;Else&quot; region, while the false exit skips the region</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The condition for the optional &quot;Else&quot; region is expressed as a PHI node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The incoming values of the PHI node are true for the &quot;If&quot; edge and false</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for the &quot;Then&quot; edge.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Additionally to that even complicated loops look like this:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\verbatim</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment">/// | |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 ^  Where:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="comment">/// | /  1 = &quot;Entry&quot; block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |/   2 = &quot;Loop&quot; optional subregion, with all exits at &quot;Flow&quot; block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3    3 = &quot;Flow&quot; block, with back edge to entry block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endverbatim</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The back edge of the &quot;Flow&quot; block is always on the false side of the branch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="comment">/// while the true side continues the general flow. So the loop condition</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">/// consist of a network of PHI nodes where the true incoming values expresses</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">/// breaks and the false values expresses continue states.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/structurizecfg"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-structurizecfg-cpp-/structurizecfg">StructurizeCFG</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Boolean;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;BoolTrue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;BoolFalse;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Build up the general order of nodes, by performing a topological sort of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="comment">/// parent region&#39;s nodes, while ensuring that there is no outer cycle node</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="comment">/// between any two inner cycle nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StructurizeCFG::orderNodes() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">  Order.resize(std::distance(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/graphtraits">GraphTraits&lt;Region &#42;&gt;::nodes&#95;begin</a>(ParentRegion),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A list of range indices of SCCs in Order, to be processed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a>&lt;std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;, 8&gt; WorkList;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = Order.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#a503c0214540e80733c0a0c53c067e6ee">while</a> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Run through all the SCCs in the subgraph starting with Entry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SCCI =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scc-iterator/#a430e6f48731308238761ee98c4d57eba">scc&#95;iterator&lt;SubGraphTraits::NodeRef, SubGraphTraits&gt;::begin</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">                 EntryNode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">         !SCCI.isAtEnd(); ++SCCI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;SCC = &#42;SCCI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An SCC up to the size of 2, can be reduced to an entry (the last node),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and a possible additional node. Therefore, it is already in order, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is no need to add it to the work-list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = SCC.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the SCC nodes to the Order array.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When we are reconstructing a PHI inside \\p PHIBlock with incoming values</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from predecessors \\p Incomings, we have a chance to mark the available value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from some blocks as undefined. The function will find out all such blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and return in \\p UndefBlks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StructurizeCFG::findUndefBlocks(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PHIBlock, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> &amp;Incomings,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;UndefBlks)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  We may get a post-structured CFG like below:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  | P1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  |/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  F1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  |\\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="comment">  //  | N</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  |/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  F2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  |\\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="comment">  //  | P2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  |/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  F3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  |\\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="comment">  //  B</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// B is the block that has a PHI being reconstructed. P1/P2 are predecessors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of B before structurization. F1/F2/F3 are flow blocks inserted during</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// structurization process. Block N is not a predecessor of B before</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// structurization, but are placed between the predecessors(P1/P2) of B after</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// structurization. This usually means that threads went to N never take the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// path N-&gt;F2-&gt;F3-&gt;B. For example, the threads take the branch F1-&gt;N may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// always take the branch F2-&gt;P2. So, when we are reconstructing a PHI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// originally in B, we can safely say the incoming value from N is undefined.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> VisitedBlock;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If two phi nodes have compatible incoming values (for each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// incoming block, either they have the same incoming value or only one phi</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node has an incoming value), let them share the merged incoming values. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a>&gt; UndefBlksMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find phi nodes that have compatible incoming values (either they have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same value for the same block or only one phi node has an incoming</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value, see example below). We only search again the phi&#39;s that are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// referenced by another phi, which is the case we care about.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example (-- means no incoming value):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// phi1 : BB1:phi2   BB2:v  BB3:--</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// phi2:  BB1:--     BB2:v  BB3:w</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then we can merge these incoming values and let phi1, phi2 use the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// same set of incoming values:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// phi1&amp;phi2: BB1:phi2  BB2:v  BB3:w</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By doing this, phi1 and phi2 would share more intermediate phi nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This would help reduce the number of phi nodes during SSA reconstruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and ultimately result in fewer COPY instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This should be correct, because if a phi node does not have incoming</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value from certain block, this means the block is not the predecessor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the parent block, so we actually don&#39;t care about its incoming value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/equivalenceclasses">EquivalenceClasses&lt;PHINode &#42;&gt;</a> PhiClasses;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Our region is uniform if:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 All conditional branches that are direct children are uniform (checked</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// above).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 And either:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   a. All sub-regions are uniform.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   b. There is one or less conditional branches among the direct children.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SubRegionsAreUniform || (ConditionalDirectChildren &lt;= 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
